column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The bad: Though I love the high ceilings
column2: wide windows that let the sun in
column3: and the industrial chic ambiance... Every time I try to find a place to sit there's a level of stickiness and grime that's slightly miffing. If you're the type who likes to visit coffee shops to do work
